title: 求助啊！服务器启动不了!!!
txt_content:
RT，出现这个错误：
    182 recipes  
27 achievements  
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [信息] Starting minecraft server version 1.2.5 
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [信息] Attempting early MinecraftForge initialization 
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [信息] Completed early MinecraftForge initialization 
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [信息] Forge Mod Loader version 2.2.91.162 for Minecraft 1.2.5 loading 
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [信息] Loading mods from D:\开荒服\mods 
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [严重] Zip file mod_chargingbench-server-1.95b-mcpc1.2.5-r2.zip failed to read properly 
2012-08-22 14:53:54 [信息] File mod_chargingbench-server-1.95b-mcpc1.2.5-r2.zip contained no mods 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] A problem has occured during mod loading. Likely a corrupt jar is located in your mods directory 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: MALFORMED 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.load(Loader.java:436)

2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:438) 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at net.minecraft.server.ThreadServerApplication.run(SourceFile:492) 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: MALFORMED 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at java.util.zip.ZipCoder.toString(Unknown Source) 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at java.util.zip.ZipFile.getZipEntry(Unknown Source)

2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at java.util.zip.ZipFile$1.nextElement(Unknown Source) 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at java.util.Collections.list(Unknown Source)

2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.load(Loader.java:419) 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] ... 5 more 
2012-08-22 14:53:55 [严重] Unexpected exception 
cpw.mods.fml.common.LoaderException: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: MALFORMED  
at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.load(Loader.java:436)  
at cpw.mods.fml.common.Loader.loadMods(Loader.java:606)  
at cpw.mods.fml.server.FMLBukkitHandler.onPreLoad(FMLBukkitHandler.java:134)

然后就自动关闭了。。。
